examples.example: 那位医生总是面带微笑，耐心地为患者解答各种问题。

translate.english: That doctor always has a smile on his face and patiently answers various questions for patients.

examples.example: 这位医生医术精湛，成功治愈了许多疑难杂症，赢得了患者们的衷心感谢。

translate.english: This doctor has excellent medical skills and has successfully cured many difficult and complicated diseases, winning the sincere gratitude of the patients.

examples.example: 善良的医生凭借精湛的医术挽救了许多宝贵的生命。

translate.english: The kind doctor has saved many precious lives with superb medical skills.
